interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Bioré J-Beauty Makeup Removing Moisturizing Cleansing Jelly, Top Japanese Makeup Remover, Gentle Skin Cleanser, Mild Floral Fragrance, Non-Greasy, 7.8 Ounce Review Date: 2020/04/11 Store: Bioré Product Description: ['Bioré J-Beauty Makeup Removing Moisturizing Cleansing Jelly is a non-greasy makeup remover that removes dirt and impurities from deep below the surface of your skin. This top Japanese makeup remover glides on gently and leaves no sticky residue. Formulated with conditioning beauty essence, this jelly leaves skin feeling moisturized and free of makeup. Satisfaction Guaranteed. Limitations may apply.'] Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '1.56 x 2.5 x 7.25 inches; 10.08 Ounces', 'Item model number': '28077_obs', 'UPC': '019100264557', 'Manufacturer': 'Kao USA Inc.'} Review Text: First of all, I don’t use to much makeup, no thick layers of foundations. Just some primer, concealer, eyes and mouth.
For me, they worked perfectly! They are pretty wet, so they took off all my makeup easily.
They are small, so if you use more layers of make up you maybe are going to need more than one.
They are soft and have a nice scent.
I have mixed skin and delicate. They did not hurt me, burn me, or leave my skin red.
After using them, my skin feels clean and moisturized. Not greasy or dry.
And they come in a super handy little box, perfect to carry around on your bag. Review Title: Works great!! Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
6 Pack Soft Headband BEoffer Coral Fleece Women Makeup Spa Head Bands Turban Fashion Bow Bowknot Hairlace Headwear Wash Face Hair Holder Elastic Top Knot Bandage Girl Baby Hair Accessories 6 Colors BEoffer {'Age Range (Description)': 'Baby', 'Material': 'Elastic', 'Fabric Type': 'Fleece', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Face Makeup', 'Product Dimensions': '7.28 x 1.97 x 0.67 inches; 1.16 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'BH-002', 'UPC': '799899729252'} I love this set! Even though I don’t need 6 of them.
They are well made, very stretchy, so I guess they fit a wide range of head sizes!
Super super soft. The fabric is thick.
Comfortable to use, it does not squeeze the head. But it holds all the hair back.
I use it when washing my face. It keeps my hair dry too.
I love the bow! Very 50’s!!!
Great colors. Like it a lot. Fun and works great! Bioré J-Beauty Makeup Removing Moisturizing Cleansing Jelly, Top Japanese Makeup Remover, Gentle Skin Cleanser, Mild Floral Fragrance, Non-Greasy, 7.8 Ounce Bioré ['Bioré J-Beauty Makeup Removing Moisturizing Cleansing Jelly is a non-greasy makeup remover that removes dirt and impurities from deep below the surface of your skin. This top Japanese makeup remover glides on gently and leaves no sticky residue. Formulated with conditioning beauty essence, this jelly leaves skin feeling moisturized and free of makeup. Satisfaction Guaranteed. Limitations may apply.'] {'Product Dimensions': '1.56 x 2.5 x 7.25 inches; 10.08 Ounces', 'Item model number': '28077_obs', 'UPC': '019100264557', 'Manufacturer': 'Kao USA Inc.'} First of all, I don’t use to much makeup, no thick layers of foundations. Just some primer, concealer, eyes and mouth.
For me, they worked perfectly! They are pretty wet, so they took off all my makeup easily.
They are small, so if you use more layers of make up you maybe are going to need more than one.
They are soft and have a nice scent.
I have mixed skin and delicate. They did not hurt me, burn me, or leave my skin red.
After using them, my skin feels clean and moisturized. Not greasy or dry.
And they come in a super handy little box, perfect to carry around on your bag. Works great!!
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Usage:** Enjoys using hair accessories for practical purposes like makeup application and facial care, with a growing interest in effective skincare products.
- **Material Preference:** Prefers soft, stretchy materials that provide comfort and a good fit for various head sizes, reflecting a broader appreciation for gentle and non-irritating formulations in skin care.
- **Aesthetic Taste:** Drawn to playful and nostalgic designs, such as bows and vibrant colors, indicating a liking for fun and fashionable styles, which may parallel an interest in aesthetically pleasing packaging and product designs.
- **Quality Expectation:** Values well-made products that deliver on comfort and functionality without causing discomfort during use; this applies to both accessories and skincare products.
- **Practicality:** Appreciates accessories that are stylish yet effective in keeping hair out of the way during personal care routines; this practicality extends to choosing skincare solutions that enhance the cleansing experience.
- **Multi-functionality:** Likes items that serve multiple purposes, such as keeping hair dry while washing the face, and is also drawn to skincare products that efficiently remove makeup while conditioning the skin.

This user likely has an engaged interest in beauty and personal care routines, balancing style and comfort in both accessories and skincare choices.
